title: 3 Bedroom Townhome You Will Love Coming Home To
posting_body: ['An elegant escape from a long day.', 'Share a glass of wine with friends in your kitchen with beautiful granite countertops, break a sweat in the wellness center, or take a dip in one of the refreshing swimming pools.', 'Apt#3760A', '- Houston, TX, 77065', '1 bedroom', '$879-1,376', '/mo', '551-1,077', 'sf', '2 bedroom', '$1,189-1,631', '/mo', '974-1,247', 'sf', '3/4 bedroom', '$1,739-2,329', '/mo', '1,461-1,880', 'sf', 'Deposit:', '0', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cats:Yes\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Dogs:Yes', 'Built:', '1994', 'Location:', 'Jersey Village/ Cypress', 'Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability', 'Features:', "Now Leasing Newly Remodeled Apartment Homes, Stainless-Steel Appliances, Granite Countertops, Tiled Kitchen Backsplash, Oversized Garden Tubs, Cultured Marble Bath, Sunrooms, 9' Ceilings, 5 Swimming Pools, Lap Pool & Picnic Area, Lighted Tennis Court & Basketball Court, Health & Wellness Center, Business Center, Coffee Bar", 'Community Amenities:', 'Fitness center, Perimeter fence, Business center, Outdoor Grills, Carports, 5 Pools, Door to door trash pickup, Club house, Picnic area, Dog Park, School bus stop, Free WiFi Areas, 2 Tennis courts, Volleyball, Gated entrance', 'Unit Amenities:', 'Intrusion alarms, W/D machines, Ice makers, Non-carpeted flooring, High ceilings, Walk-in showers, Walk-in closets, Private patios/balconies, Storage closet outside, Garden/large tubs, Attached garages, W/D connections, Hi-speed internet, Custom built-ins, Cable ready', 'For more information about this community contact:', 'Mary Kay Noone\xa0\xa0(Agent)', 'Apartment Living Locators', 'show contact info', 'Refer to Apt#3760A', 's29027  a3760A  ad2361 i']
